tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE comedy_material (   joke_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,   joke_text TEXT NOT NULL,   script_id INT NOT NULL,   comedy_rating INT,   date_added TIMESTAMP NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE jokes (
  joke_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  joke_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE scripts (
  script_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  script_title VARCHAR(255),
  script_content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE comedy_material (
  material_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  material_type VARCHAR(100),
  material_content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE comedians (
  comedian_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  comedian_name VARCHAR(100),
  comedian_age INT
)
